choices: Dad Wakes Up with Rat Ears
Dad Wakes Up with A Wolf Tail
Mum Wakes Up with A Cow Udder
Mum Wakes Up with Donkey Ears
1.content:
The warm sun beat down from the clear blue sky as you and your family drive along the seemingly empty highway "dad when are you going to get there?" you ask feeling rather hot in the car "not long Kev" your dad says as the sign for Alnwyk passes by father fast "new town and new friends" Nick moans while staring at the big buildings of the city, your car drives along the bustling streets as everyone looks at you passing by.

You finally reach the home you will be living in a fairly nice sized home with front porch "not bad" you say with a smile as you venture up to the front door your mum opens it and you walk in and make a dash for the bedrooms to get first pick "i call the bedroom at the far hall" you yell in delight just as Nick and Emma walk upstairs you yell out "I got my room slow coaches" Nick grumbles as he picks any room nearby and Emma takes the room nearest the bathroom leaving your parents with the standard room for parents after you finish you all venture downstairs and start making plans to explore the town.


*3 months later*

The family has settled in and know most of the town the day has been rather boring for you and your brother and sister so you all decide to turn in early for the night, the following morning you wake up and venture down stares and decide to make some breakfast and watch some TV "man this town is so boring nothing but crap around here" you mumble out loud as Emma walks downstairs scratching her head and yawning "morning bro" she says after yawning "fancy checking out the arcade later?" she asks, you lift your head up as she says this "arcade? they have an arcade?" she nods with a smile and you chuckle a little "sure lets go around lunch" Emma nods and flicks on the TV "how long till the others wake up?" you ask Emma shrugs as you sit down next to her waiting for everyone else to wake up but unknown to you something has happened over night to one of your parents



What happens next?
1.title: Moving To Town

13.content:
A commercial starts and Emma gets up to get a drink. You hear footsteps coming down the stairs. You look over your shoulder and see your mom coming down.
"Good morning" She says.
"Good morning, Mom" Emma says sitting back down on the couch. You look over at your mom and see something weird.
"Um... Mom, is there a pillow under your shirt?" You ask
"Of course not, why would there be?" She replied
"Well, your stomach looks a little big." You mom lifted her shirt and rather than a stomach, there were cow udders! She fainted and Emma jumped over the back of the couch to her, with you following close behind.
"What the eff is this?" Emma asked staring at her moms udders.
"I don't know, but it can't be real." You say
"I'm not sure, it sure looks real, there are teats and everything."
"How do you know what those are?" You asked referring to the teats
"I payed attention in Biology. But this is way too realistic to be fake, touch it."
"What? Why can't you?"
"Because it's freaking me out."
"Fine." You reach out your hand and slowly approach the udder. It was squishy and a little colder than the room. "There's no way this is fake, I must still be dreaming." Emma reached over and pinched you
"Doesn't look like it, but this is really weird."
Then...
13.title: Mum Wakes Up with A Cow Udder

131.content:
You mom groaned and she sat up. Emma told her what was going on and she almost fainted again. She poked her udder. She looked around and said
"Does you father know yet?"
"No, he's still asleep." Emma said
"Oh, well don't wake him. I'm not sure how to explain this." Both you and Emma nodded. You mom started rubbing her udder, proof that she was calming down. "Kevin, could you rub it please, it makes it feel more like a stomach." You reached you hand out, slowly, but your mom was impatient and pulled you hand to her udder. You started rubbing and she let out a sigh of relief. You stopped, but she asked you to start again. Emma wasn't sure what to make of this until she noticed something,
"Mom, the teats are getting redder." Just as she finished, milk started seeping out of the teats. It didn't last long, and Emma got a towel to wipe up the spilled milk. You mom finally let you stop rubbing her udder and told you to go t the hospital and ask about this. You got your keys and left.

On the way, you saw a woman sitting on a bench, waiting for the bus. You normally wouldn't cared much, except her skin was pink. "It must be my mind going nuts from this whole udder thing." You got to the hospital and went to the receptionist.
"Welcome, what can I help you with?" She asked
"Um.. My mom woke up this morning, and she had.. A cow udder where her stomach should be."
"I see, come with me." She went into a room and got a book out of a drawer. She handed it to him, the title was "Animals of Alnwyk". You sat down in a chair and she asked you,
"How long have you lived here?"
"About three months."
"Ok, how many are in your family?"
"There are five of us."
"Alright, here's the story. Here in Alnwyk, people grow animal parts all the time. We don't know why, and we can't prevent it. One strange thing is, the transformations are always in the same order. So udder comes first. The book will tell you what is next and what to expect. Has your mom's udder lactated yet?"
"A little."
"Then by the time you get home, he skin will be white with black spots on it. Any other women in the house?"
"My sister, Emma."
"Was anything weird about her?"
"Nope, she was still completely human when i left."
"I see, well her time will come soon. And how about men?"
"There's me, my father, and my brother. What come first for us?"
131.title: Mom wakes up

1312.content:
"Men grow a wolf tail first, so be expecting that." The thought of yourself with a tail made you shiver. She lead you out of the room and you drove back home.

You opened the front door and saw the back of your mom's head. She was sitting on the couch. You went around to the other side, and her skin was white, just like the lady said. There were darker spots that you assumed would become the black spots. Then you noticed the plastic pin in front of her.
"What's the bin for?" You asked
"It's for when my udder lactates, which it does more often now." she said rubbing her udder.
"Where's Emma?" You asked
"She went up to her room, she said she was nauseous."
"EMMA, NO!" You sprung from your seat and sprinted up the stairs. Emma's door was closed, but you knocked it open. Emma was on her bed...
1312.title: Wolf Tail

13123.content:
Emma was sitting on her bed with a plastic bowl beside her, reading a magazine. She looked up and saw you,
"What did the hospital say?" She asked
"Aparently it's something with the town where people grow animal parts, and a cow udder is the first one for girls."
"So, I'm gonna get an udder too?"
"That's what the lady at the hospital said. And dad, Nick, and I ate going to get wolf tails."
"Well, that's not as bad as an udder."
"True, but mom has turned white and is getting black spots. Odds are she'll get cow ears and a tail. But let's stay calm. I got a book that tells what's going to happen in what order."
"What does it say about the cow thing?"
"Um... Here it is. Animal number one, cow. The woman grows and udder, tins white with black spots, cow ears, tail, then it all changes back to normal."
"I think it's starting for me, my stomach feels really full."
13123.title: Completely normal

131231.content:
Emma laid back on her bed and pulled her top up so her stomach was visiable. It had turned a pinkish, and the were four little bumps. Her belly started to grow, as the udder filled with whatever is inside an udder. The bumps got longer, turning into teats. Within a few minutes, Emma had an udder as big as your moms. She sat up and stared at it. It clearly was bigger than she had prepared for, because the bottom of her short had ripped. She pulled her top off and threw it in the corner. You helped her up and she almost fell forward from the weight.
"How did mom not notice hers. It weighs at least twenty pounds." She said. You helped down the stairs and she sat on the couch next to your mom, whoes spots had became black. She looked at Emma and then at you.
"Every one in town grows an animal part at some point, which later goes away, and fir girls the first is an udder." Your mom nodded and looked to Emma, who wasn't sure how to handle this.

There was a scream from upstairs...
131231.title: Transformation is fast

1312311.content: You started running upstairs and tried to open the door, but it was locked. You ran to get the pick lock that you had just in case you were locked out of your room. Then your dad came down perfectly fine. Then you yelled, "OH NO, NICK!" and ran upstairs.
1312311.title: Dad

13123112.content:
Nick screamed.
You ran to him, and saw a slow slithering furry wolf tail sneaking out.
It slowly pushed its way, with the sound of growing, stretching skin.
It stopped, fur growing now. The fur spread up his spine. Finally, it stopped.
I stared.
He was exploring his new appendage.
It started to wag, back and forth.
Nick started to control it. He wagged it again.
He laughed. Now it seemed he liked it.
I didn't know how he could like it, but the question was:
When am I next??
You suddenly felt a ticking feeling down your spine...

You got paranoid.
What do you do?
13123112.title: Nick has a wolf tail

Then footsteps are heard walking down the stairs you panic and cover your mum with a cusion as your dad walks in yawning a little "morning" he said sleepyly as he noticed your mum on the floor "whats going on?" he asks you begin to feel nervous "n..nothing dad" you stutter as your dad pushes you aside and pushes the cusion off and sees your mum's udder "oh man i gotta be dreaming this" he says "nope your not dreaming i don't think" you respond as he sits on a chair nearby "so what do we do now?" you shrug and look at Emma who was still reeling from the shock "ok let's get her on the couch" you say as you and your dad move her to the couch as you lay her down she comes too and notices her udder but she simply rubs it "Nick will freak if he sees this so no one tell him" she says in a serious tone and you all nod just then the doorbell rings

134221.content:
"What is going on!?" you say. But as you soon as you said that, you feel sick, so you rush to the bathroom upstairs. As you get there you throw up into the sink and look up into the mirror. You look in shock is you ears start to look like cow ears. You stare in shock as you feel pain in your face. There is a cow snout growing out of your face as your eyes change to a almost black color. Your skin starts to turn white fur with black patches all over your body. You start to gain some weight, (You use to be 175 pounds and 5,11). Your clothes start to rip, mostly around your crotch. You feel your crotch to see it was so good yet it hurt a little. Your ass was starting to get bigger also feeling something coming out of pants above your ass. A cow's tail pops right out swinging around. Your crotch area is getting bigger also. Your legs get a little muscle then usual also getting fatter. You put your hoof on your snout as you say that and can't believe you said that. You rub it and it feels amazing you keep rubbing, until you notice milk is sapping through. You moo in excitement and then you start milking your large udder, with milk flying in the air. You keep milking it while it keeps getting bigger. You see the udder is now a little past your knees, and you slip into a orgasm. You wake up later to see yourself in the bathtub covered with milk. You get out to see yourself in the full view mirror. You see an anthropomorphic dairy cow with an huge udder, you still have your medium black hair matching with your new look. You look at your back side to see your fur and cow tail above your large ass that looks nice, you notice that a log of features of a regular dairy cow. You see that you have a anus under your tail in your ass, you should be called Katie now. "Well, I doooon't know what happen but I actually like this fooooor some reasooooOOoooOoooon." you say and mooed.
What now/

choices: You notice Emma's ears are different
14.content:
As you pour yourself a drink in the kitchen you can hear footsteps walking down the stairs you peer over your shoulder to see your mum enter the room yawning as she raises her hand and waves "morning" she says in a groggy tone "morning" you and Emma say in unison as you both turn around your jaws drop sitting nestled in your mums hair are a pair of grey furred donkey ears "woah shit am i seeing things?" you mutter still not sure what your seeing, your mum walks into the kitchen and gets herself a drink of water still unaware of her ears "err mum have you looked in a mirror recently?" Emma asks your mum turns around "no why?" she asks feeling confused so you motion her to the living room mirror and as shes sees herself she muffles her scream with her hands "how did i get donkey ears?" she says feeling scared "i..i don't know" you say as you touch them and they twitch at your touch "woah weird" you mumble your mum doesn't know what to do so she puts a towel around her head "don't tell your father or Nick they will freak out if they do find out" so you and Emma nod while your mum sits down to watch TV.


The morning was going by so slow your mum scratching her ears every 5 minutes "Kevin be a dear and go next door quickly for me please" you look up "uh sure why's that?" you ask and she looks at you "please Kev just do it" you only nod and walk towards the house next door "i hope Mrs Anderson is home" you venture up the fairly damp steps and ring her doorbell after a few minutes a young woman answers the door "hi is Mrs Anderson home?" you ask "no sorry i'm her daughter Cassie is there anything i can help you with?" you rub your chin then look at her she is wearing a wooly hat on her head covering her lovely light blue hair which came halfway down her back "yeah my mum woke up about half hour ago with donkey ears and she doesn't know what to do" Cassie giggles "it's natural hun it's something that can't be helped" she pulls her hat off and your eyes go wide as you see her long donkey ears "i started changing about 2 weeks ago give it another week or so and she'll have one of these" she turns around to show a tail swaying gently she steps outside "i can come over and show some support if you'd like" you nod so you both head back to your house.


Back at your house Emma is idly scratching your mums ears keeping her calm as you and Cassie walk inside "mum i couldn't find Mrs Anderson but i found Cassie her daughter she's here to support you" your mum turns around to see Cassie and she sighs with relief "at least i'm not alone" she says as Cassie sits down next to her and starts to hug her.


What next?

155.title: Something Else

info.brief_description: A large town in the middle of nowhere has many strange things happen but no one knows why
info.description:
The Story is based on a family who move to the city of Alnwyk but unknown to them it has weird things happening to all the residents as they transform into animals for a set amount of time.


Characters are


Kevin (you) - 20

Norman (Dad) - 45

Sally (Mum) - 42

Nick (Older Brother) - 21

Emma (Twin Sister) - 20



Rules are

No TG at all everyone will stay their own gender

Everyone is to be Anthro animal and the time limit is unknown so they can stay in that animal form for as long as you want (just NOT permanent)

Nudity is acceptable and a little sex is ok, i'll alow a little incest but not tons of it

This is to be kept in 2nd person at all times


UPDATE: I will edit chapters for any spelling mistakes just to make it easy for other people to read, also i have noticed a few one line chapters could people adding possibly try to write a bit more than just a sentence to allow the story to flow better, thanks :)


Thats all the rules so enjoy yourself
